column5: Anybody else having issues?  Last night and today this site doesn't want to load. No issues with other sites. I usually have to hit refresh once or twice and then it loads properly.

Anybody else having issues?  Last night and today this site doesn't want to load. No issues with other sites. I usually have to hit refresh once or twice and then it loads properly. Very slow to refresh at times and going from forum to General Disscussion.
Hear you , Rob. Working on it. Adpeeps is slow loading and the page won't load 'til Adpeeps loads. Adpeeps is the square ad in the upper right side of the page.
Yep.. and Roy seems to have his finger on it in advance as usual !
No worries. Wasn't sure if it was something on this end.
Been doing it a couple of days now.
Seems ok right now on my end
Seems ok right now on my end Big improvement over last night and earlier today. Seems to be back to normal.. At least at my end.
Yeah, I seem good now too, thanks Roy.
Yep.. and Roy seems to have his finger on it in advance as usual !  Noticed that this morning.  It is that one ad at the top of the page which was a problem.

Noticed a problem getting through to the General Discussion page last night.  Started blaming myself right away.   Now what button did I mistakenly  press to cause this?   Home Depot ad kept popping up.   Never gonna shop there again if this doesn"t clear up.  Ok now.
Ya it needed gas....  filled it up.. it should be fine for a while now.
